sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

education_years.Description: years of education calculated as formal education of 6 months or more. Starts from the first year of primary/elementary school onwards. Note that Australian education system includes 13 years of school: 7 years primary/elementary 6 years high school.

education_specify.Description: the highest level of formal education completed (i.e., does not include uncompleted education or education currently undertaken). In Australia, 'technical school' is education undertaken in the TAFE/vocational education sector

visual_impairment.Description: any kind of vision impairment including wearing reading glasses (self reported)

mental_illness_history.Description: self report of whether the person has had a current or past Axis I psychiatric condition

mental_illness_history_specify.Description: diagnosis or treatment Whether the person has received a diagnosis for any Axis I psychiatric condition

alcolhol_drinking_days.Description: Includes number of days per week/month the person drinks

alcohol_number_drinks.Description: Number average number of standard drinks per drinking session

recreational_drugs.Description: Used recreational drugs in last 6 months

recreational_drugs_specify.Description: Description of recreational drugs used in last 6 months

cesd_r.Description: R Centre for Epidemiological Studies Depression Inventory - Revised total score
